title: My New Doctor Thinks I Need Meds
description:
Jackie is frustrated with her primary care doctor who's pushing her to take anti-depressants while she grieves her deceased husband. - Dr. Laura: "Informing your doctor that you're sad, not depressed, will help her avoid future misdiagnoses."

Do you know the difference between profound sadness and depression? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
